meanings.definition: Half the diameter of a circle or sphere.
meanings.sent1: The semidiameters of the circle were used to calculate its area.
meanings.sent2: The semidiameters of the sphere helped in determining its volume.
meanings.sent3: The semidiameters of the pizza were so big that they barely fit on the plate.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like the semidiameters of a perfect circle, radiating warmth and joy.
meanings.sent5: The semidiameters of the canyon were so vast that they seemed to stretch into infinity.

meanings.definition: A line segment from the center of a circle to a point on its circumference.
meanings.sent1: He drew the semidiameters on the circle to mark the points accurately.
meanings.sent2: The semidiameters intersected the circumference at precise points.
meanings.sent3: The semidiameters of the clock face pointed to the hours with precision.
meanings.sent4: Her gaze followed the semidiameters of the spider web, marveling at its intricate design.
meanings.sent5: The semidiameters of the flower petals reached out like delicate spokes of a wheel.
